message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $11,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the exclusivity, but $11,500 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your interest and the value you see in the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposed price for the product is $11,000. I hope this aligns better with your budget and we can move forward with the transaction.
